an5.308-1152:1.1: “For the complete understanding … finishing … giving up … ending … vanishing … fading away … cessation … giving away … letting go of greed, five things should be developed.”
an5.308-1152:1.2: “Of hate … delusion … anger … hostility … disdain … contempt … jealousy … stinginess … deceit … deviousness … obstinacy … aggression … conceit … arrogance … vanity … negligence … for insight … complete understanding … finishing … giving up … ending … vanishing … fading away … cessation … giving away … letting go … five things should be developed.
an5.308-1152:2.2: The powers of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
an5.308-1152:2.3: For the letting go of negligence, these five things should be developed.”
an5.308-1152:3.5: The Book of the Fives is finished.
an5.308-1152:4.13: The Book of the Fives is finished.
